means: 遍及，弥漫( pervade的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: There is a pervading sense of menace.
sentence.Network_cn: 有一种危机四伏的感觉。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Rut I see its values now pervading this nation and its life ., 但是我看到了它的价值现已充斥于这个国家及其生活之中.
But I see its values now pervading this nation and its life ., 但是我看到了它的价值观现已遍及这个国家及其生活.

list.abs: 饱览了：feast one's eyes on...花香袭人：pervading perfume生机勃勃，气象万千：vitality and variety.
an unpleasant smell pervades the house .一种难闻的气味弥漫了全屋。
combined , these elements provide an idyllic haven a luxuriant tropical garden a pervading sense of tranquility and luxurious relaxation .这些要素结合起来，给繁茂的热带花园带来了田园诗般的避风港，和宁静和奢华休闲的普遍意义。

show according to investigation , divide city of individual out-of-the-way province , the car line of business that rent already pervaded countrywide each district , already registered …据调查显示，除个别偏远省市，汽车租赁业已遍及全国各地，已注册的…

entry.def: If something pervades a place or thing, it is a noticeable feature throughout it.

example.ex: The smell of sawdust and glue pervaded the factory...
example.tran: 工厂里弥漫着锯屑和胶水的气味。

example.ex: ...the corruption that pervades every stratum of the country...
example.tran: 渗透到社会各阶层的腐败

sentences.sentence: "a pervasive anxiety overshadows the triumphs of individuals"

auth_sentence.content: Or is the power of the oil companies all pervading?
auth_sentence.res_content: Or is the power of the oil companies all pervading?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Or is the power of the oil companies all pervading?

auth_sentence.content: Nevertheless, the Garvey presence is all-pervading.
auth_sentence.res_content: Nevertheless, the Garvey presence is all-pervading.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Nevertheless, the Garvey presence is all-pervading.

auth_sentence.content: A sort of moral malaria pervading society and carrying off many victims.
auth_sentence.res_content: A sort of moral malaria pervading society and carrying off many victims.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A sort of moral malaria pervading society and carrying off many victims.
